just so.translation[0].definitions[0].de: with everything arranged neatly and tidily
just so.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Her house always has to be just so.
just so.translation[0].definitions[1].de: used to say yes or agree with something
just so.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: ‘You should have beaten them, shouldn’t you?’ ‘Just so.’
